entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Stop escalating the divisions in this country. Coronavirus does not care if the host is Dem, Rep, Independent-our response to the virus shouldn’t either. #covid19 #Factsmatter
